original_title: DJ Shadow and Cut Chemist present: Hard Sell At The Hollywood Bowl
overview: It's June 24, 2007; DJ Shadow and Cut Chemist are turning the world-famous Hollywood Bowl into a transforming jukebox. Blazing through musical genres with dexterity and wit, they are accompanied by live visuals and animation, 8 turntables, and... of course... an unhealthy quantity of 45's. Join 15,000 spectators as "the greatest team in the history of mass slaughter" present the exciting world of sound!
title: DJ Shadow and Cut Chemist present: Hard Sell At The Hollywood Bowl
